author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour Weekend full episode October 11, 2015 PBS NewsHour
text: On this edition for Sunday, October 11th, 2015, Turkey mourns the victims of terrorist bombings that killed nearly 100 people, and in our signature segment, upcoming elections in Myanmar could be a boon for democracy in the country, and Houston's low-cost plan to increase bus ridership. Hari Sreenivasan anchors from New York.
